articles.content:
Indiana beat Little Rock 87-68 on Wednesday night at Assembly Hall to improve to 5-0 this season.

articles.title: Devils fans throw trash on ice after three disallowed goals help end 13-game win streak - New York Post
articles.description: The Devils had three goals disallowed during the game after the third call didn’t go their way, some fans started throwing trash onto the ice.
articles.content:
What the Devil?
